validation_metadata.verification_method: Direct review of Minn. Stat. Ch. 13

rights_of_access.description: All government data are public by default unless specifically classified as nonpublic by federal law, state statute, or temporary classification.
rights_of_access.conditions: Presumption of public access; can only be classified nonpublic by specific authority
rights_of_access.implementation_notes: Strong default presumption; comprehensive classification system
rights_of_access.request_tips: Assert: 'Minn. Stat. § 13.03 presumes all government data public. Please provide [data] unless you cite specific authority for nonpublic classification.'

rights_of_access.subcategory: As Soon As Reasonably Possible (General) / 10 Business Days (Data Subject)
rights_of_access.description: General public data: as soon as reasonably possible. Data subject requests (personal data): 10 business days maximum.
rights_of_access.conditions: Dual timeline - general vs. data subject; 10-day maximum for personal data
rights_of_access.implementation_notes: Faster timeline for individuals seeking their own data
rights_of_access.request_tips: Cite: 'Minn. Stat. § 13.03/13.04 requires response as soon as reasonably possible (10 business days for my personal data). Please respond promptly.'

rights_of_access.description: Inspection is free. Copying limited to 25 cents per page for first 100 pages. Electronic copies at actual cost. May require prepayment if costs exceed $100.
rights_of_access.conditions: Inspection always free; 25¢/page for first 100 pages; actual cost for electronic; $100 prepayment threshold
rights_of_access.implementation_notes: Free inspection ensures access regardless of cost; reasonable copying fees
rights_of_access.request_tips: Cite fee limits: 'Minn. Stat. § 13.03 provides free inspection and caps copies at 25¢/page (first 100). Please comply with statutory fee limits.'

rights_of_access.subcategory: Data Subject Rights - Personal Data Access
rights_of_access.description: Individuals have right to data about themselves with 10 business day response deadline (excluding weekends/holidays). Immediate compliance preferred when possible.
rights_of_access.conditions: 10 business day maximum; immediate if possible; applies to data about requesting individual
rights_of_access.applies_to: Data subjects seeking their own information
rights_of_access.implementation_notes: Special protection for personal data access; faster timeline than general requests
rights_of_access.request_tips: For personal data: 'Minn. Stat. § 13.04 grants me 10 business-day access to my personal data, immediately if possible. Please provide my records within this timeframe.'
